forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow showers. Mostly sunny. High near 44, with temperatures falling to around 39 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 29, with temperatures rising to around 31 overnight. West northwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 43, with temperatures falling to around 40 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 26. Northwest wind 1 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 36. Northwest wind around 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: The Snow Crew had a chance to test the system today with a nice shot of cold air.
